DOC.brief_summary: To collect pilot data on the prevalence and incidence of asymptomatic Leishmania donovani infection in HIV infected individuals in a visceral leishmaniasis (VL)-HIV endemic region to inform the feasibility of a larger study exploring a screen and treat strategy for VL in HIV co-infected individuals in East-Africa (Ethiopia).
DOC.brief_title: Asymptomatic Leishmania Infection in HIV Patients
DOC.criteria: HIV infection without a history of VL in the last 5 years stable residents of a VLendemic area willing to participate and giving free informed consent younger than 18 years
